title: Belmont-sur-Vair
text: Belmont-sur-Vair (, literally "Belmont on <a href="Vair%20%28river%29">Vair</a>") is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Vosges%20%28department%29">Vosges</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in <a href="Grand%20Est">Grand Est</a> in northeastern <a href="France">France</a>.
